articles.title: Elon Musk's Revived Twitter Deal Could Saddle Banks With Big Losses - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Elon Musk’s takeover of Twitter would be paid for in part with $13 billion of debt seven banks including Morgan Stanley and Barclays agreed to provide. They could now face $500 million in losses if they tried to unload all the debt.
